country.name: Sudan
country.overview: The Sudan or Sudan also known as North Sudan since South Sudan's independence and officially the Republic of the Sudan, is a country in Northeast Africa.

translations.name: ဆူဒန်နိုင်ငံ
ประเทศซูดาน

geography.location_description: north-eastern Africa, bordering the Red Sea, between Egypt and Eritrea
geography.area_note: slightly less than one-fifth the size of the US
geography.climate: hot and dry; arid desert; rainy season varies by region (April to November)
geography.terrain: generally flat, featureless plain; desert dominates the north
geography.hazards: dust storms and periodic persistent droughts
geography.notes: dominated by the Nile and its tributaries

languages.name: Algerian Saharan Arabic
languages.maps: Algeria, Morocco, Tunisia and Western Sahara

languages.name: Moroccan Arabic
languages.maps: Algeria, Morocco, Tunisia and Western Sahara
